        Keep the best individual alive between generations.

      • selectionType

      • selectionRange

        public double selectionRange
        Used in tournament selection. The percentage of the pool to include in the tournament. (1.0 = 100%)

      • selectionUseScoreRank

        public boolean selectionUseScoreRank
        Use the individuals rank instead of the score during selection.

      • selectionUseDiversityRank

        public boolean selectionUseDiversityRank
        Use the individuals diversity rank during selection. selectionUseScoreRank must also be true for this to have an effect.
